name: Samurai Jack
summary_text: A samurai sent through time fights to return home and save the world.

name: Enemy at the Gates
summary_text: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

name: The Last Castle
summary_text: A court-martialed General rallies together twelve hundred inmates to rise against a corrupt and sadistic warden.

name: Dragon Ball Super
summary_text: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, The mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

name: About a Boy
summary_text: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

name: The Dragon Prince
summary_text: Two human princes forge an unlikely bond with the elfin assassin sent to kill them, embarking on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
summary_text: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

name: Transparent
summary_text: An L.A. family with serious boundary issues have their past and future unravel when a dramatic admission causes everyone's secrets to spill out.

name: The Thing
summary_text: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

name: Generation Kill
summary_text: A Rolling Stone reporter, embedded with The 1st Recon Marines chronicles his experiences during the first wave of the American-led assault on Baghdad in 2003.

name: The Brothers Grimm
summary_text: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

name: Battlefield Earth
summary_text: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

name: Overboard
summary_text: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her they're husband and wife.

name: American Gigolo
summary_text: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

name: The Investigation
summary_text: Copenhagen Police's Homicide unit, headed by Jens Møller, tries to solve the murder of Swedish journalist Kim Wall.

name: Tiny Pretty Things
summary_text: Follows the world of an elite ballet academy, and charts the rise and fall of young adults who live far from their homes, each standing on the verge of greatness or ruin.

name: Horns
summary_text: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his forehead.

name: Before Midnight
summary_text: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

name: Danger Force
summary_text: Captain Man has a new crew of superhero sidekicks - Danger Force. Captain Man and Schwoz create a fake school to train the kids to harness their uncontrollable superpowers to fight crime.

name: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
summary_text: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.

name: The Rockford Files
summary_text: The cases of an easy-going ex-convict turned private investigator.

name: Badehotellet
summary_text: The seaside hotel "Badehotellet" in NW Denmark opens for its wealthy guests each summer. We follow the guests and staff at the hotel from 1928 and into the 1940s.

name: God's Own Country
summary_text: Spring. Yorkshire. Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.

name: ALF
summary_text: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with the Tanner family after crashing into their garage.

name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
summary_text: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

name: Snitch
summary_text: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son, who was imprisoned after being set up in a drug deal.

name: Sunset Blvd.
summary_text: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

name: And Then There Were None
summary_text: Ten strangers are invited to an island by a mysterious host, and start to get killed one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

name: Just Married
summary_text: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

name: Roswell
summary_text: The lives of three young alien/human hybrids with extraordinary gifts in Roswell.

name: Sisters
summary_text: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

name: Uncle Buck
summary_text: Bachelor and all-round slob Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

name: The Rifleman
summary_text: The adventures of a Wild West rancher, wielding a customized rapid-fire Winchester rifle, and his son.

name: Elektra
summary_text: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

name: Conan the Destroyer
summary_text: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

name: Weathering with You
summary_text: A high-school boy who has run away to Tokyo befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

name: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D
summary_text: A young boy is recruited by his imaginary friends Sharkboy and Lavagirl to help save their planet.

name: The Unit
summary_text: Hour long show which looks at the life of American super-secret operators.

name: Da Vinci's Demons
summary_text: Follows Leonardo Da Vinci during his early days in Florence, as a young artist, inventor and dreamer, trying to change the future.

name: Along Came Polly
summary_text: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

name: Escape to the Chateau
summary_text: British engineer Dick Strawbridge and his wife Angel buy a rundown French chateau. The series shows them over the course of a year, as they restore the building that has stood empty for 40 years.

name: Boys Don't Cry
summary_text: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

name: Sky High
summary_text: A commentary on Spanish society dressed as a thriller about the misadventures of a gang of young petty criminals after the real estate crash.

name: Good on Paper
summary_text: After years of putting her career first, a stand-up comic meets a guy who seems perfect: smart, nice, successful and possibly too good to be true.

name: Van Wilder
summary_text: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

name: Blackbird
summary_text: A terminally ill mother arranges to bring her family together one last time before she dies. A remake of the 2014 Danish film 'Silent Heart'.

name: Highlander
summary_text: Duncan MacLeod is Immortal, and must live in modern society, concealing his true nature while fighting other Immortals.

name: Hara-Kiri
summary_text: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

name: The Secret Life of Pets
summary_text: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

name: Fatman
summary_text: A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.

name: The Philadelphia Story
summary_text: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
summary_text: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

name: So I Married My Anti-Fan
summary_text: The romance between top star Hoo Joon and his anti-fan reporter Lee Geun Young who end up living together.

name: Tiana
summary_text: Tiana continues to explore New Orleans in a musical series.

name: My Bodyguard
summary_text: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

name: Sand Dollar Cove
summary_text: Real estate development project manager Elli is sent by her company to acquire the beachfront property they've chosen as the site of their new resort. Brody, the charming local wants to make sure the town's beloved pier remains intact.

name: Las Vegas
summary_text: Welcome to the Montecito Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, where you can do anything you want, but Ed Deline and his crack surveillance team will be watching. Just remember: what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas.

name: The DUFF
summary_text: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

name: Frailty
summary_text: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

name: Ambulance
summary_text: Two robbers steal an ambulance after their heist goes awry.

name: Dynasty Warriors
summary_text: This movie is adapted from an Internet game of the same title. The story is set in the turbulent late Eastern Han Dynasty. Ambitious Dong Zhuo controls the court and the commonalty, and heroes from all over the country begin to rise.

name: Videodrome
summary_text: A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

name: Pootie Tang
summary_text: "The Man" is baffled by a chill hero's invincible weapon: gibberish.

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
summary_text: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.

name: Everybody Knows
summary_text: Laura, a Spanish woman living in Buenos Aires, returns to her hometown outside Madrid with her two children to attend her sister's wedding. However, the trip is upset by unexpected events that bring secrets into the open.

name: Mechanic: Resurrection
summary_text: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

name: A Good Year
summary_text: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

name: Disenchanted
summary_text: Ten years after her happily ever after, Giselle questions her happiness, inadvertently turning the lives of those in the real world and Andalasia upside down in the process.

name: The Lover
summary_text: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

name: Judy
summary_text: Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.

name: Army of the Dead: Lost Vegas
summary_text: Scott and highlight his rescue crew's efforts to protect all they love during the first phases of the mysterious zombie outbreak in Vegas.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: The adventures and romance of a sensitive and cultured lion-man and a crusading assistant district attorney in Manhattan, New York City.

name: The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles
summary_text: The adventures of the archaeological treasure hunter in his youth as related by an elderly Indiana Jones.

name: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
summary_text: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is based on real-life stoners Jay and Silent Bob, so when they get no profit from a big-screen adaptation, they set out to wreck the movie.

name: El Chapo
summary_text: A look at the life of notorious drug kingpin, El Chapo, from his early days in the 1980s working for the Guadalajara Cartel, to his rise to power during the '90s as the head of the Sinaloa Cartel and his ultimate downfall in 2016.

name: Charade
summary_text: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

name: High Life
summary_text: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
summary_text: Re-imagining of Final Fantasy VII (1997). A former soldier joins an eco-terrorist group in a mission against the electric power company he used to work for in order to protect the planet and all who reside on it.

name: The New Pope
summary_text: Two Popes. Only one Vatican. A holy war to come.

name: The Last Witch Hunter
summary_text: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

name: Us
summary_text: The poignant and hilarious story of the Petersens during their vacation across Europe where the father Douglas tries to win back the love of his wife Connie and become reconciled with their son Albie.

name: Gretel & Hansel
summary_text: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

name: Leap Year
summary_text: Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose to her boyfriend Jeremy on February 29, leap day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.

name: The Kissing Booth 2
summary_text: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

name: My Spy
summary_text: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

name: The Little Shop of Horrors
summary_text: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

name: The Road to El Dorado
summary_text: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

name: Dutch
summary_text: For Dutch, survival is the ultimate score, and power is the deadliest high of all. When he gains control of an African drug lord's stolen heroin business, Dutch quickly makes it the most feared drug empire on the East Coast.

name: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
summary_text: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

name: Bronson
summary_text: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

name: The Scorpion King
summary_text: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

name: Rushmore
summary_text: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

name: Abigail
summary_text: Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed because of an epidemic and Abby's father was one of the sick. Going against the authorities to find her father, Abby learns that her city is actually full of magic.

name: Winter's Bone
summary_text: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

name: The Reckoning
summary_text: Evelyn, a young widow haunted by the recent suicide of her husband Joseph, is falsely accused of being a witch by her Landlord after she rejects his advances.

name: The Saint
summary_text: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

name: You've Got Mail
summary_text: Book superstore magnate, Joe Fox and independent book shop owner, Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

name: Get Hard
summary_text: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

name: Ancient Aliens
summary_text: Science and mythology - and how they are the same thing.

name: Grown-ish
summary_text: A spinoff of ABC's "Black-ish," Zoey Johnson is off to college and must live outside the nest, dealing with drugs, sex, and relationships along the way.

name: Scary Movie 4
summary_text: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

name: Only the Brave
summary_text: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
summary_text: Brother-sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch hunters who help innocent villagers. But they soon stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.

name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
summary_text: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

name: I Am Mother
summary_text: In the wake of humanity's extinction, a teenage girl is raised by a robot designed to repopulate the earth. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.

name: Descendants of the Sun
summary_text: This drama tells of the love story that develops between a surgeon and a special forces officer.

name: The Hate U Give
summary_text: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressure from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.

name: Hotel Artemis
summary_text: Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.

name: The Virtues
summary_text: Falling into despair after his nine-year-old son leaves for Australia with his ex, Joseph walks away from his present life and boards a boat for Ireland to confront painful memories from his childhood.

name: Miss Scarlet and the Duke
summary_text: Eliza Scarlet joins forces with a Scotland Yard Inspector to solve crime in 19th century London.

name: Woe
summary_text: A brother and sister stumble upon their father's secret one year after his death. They soon learn that this secret may not be his alone.

name: The Nest
summary_text: A teenage girl in Glasgow agrees to carry a baby for couple Dan and Emily.

name: Wanted
summary_text: Two strangers are prime suspects in a murder.

name: Gone Mom
summary_text: Jennifer Dulos, the wealthy, Connecticut mother-of-five who mysteriously vanished.

name: Pan
summary_text: Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be for ever known as Peter Pan.

name: Black Money Love
summary_text: Omar is a police officer. After the death of his fiancé he suffers great pain. Sibel, Omar's fiancée's body was found on the top of a cliff, in a car next to a fairly old, rich business man. After the shock of her sudden death and the accusations of his love cheating on him, Omar realizes that there is more behind her suspicious murder.

name: Chronicle
summary_text: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

name: The Wedding Planner
summary_text: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

name: Smokin' Aces
summary_text: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

name: Respect
summary_text: The life story of legendary R&B singer, Aretha Franklin.

name: Howard the Duck
summary_text: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

name: Fallen
summary_text: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

name: The Mysterious Benedict Society
summary_text: A group of gifted orphans are recruited by an eccentric, benefactor to go on a secret mission.

name: Tacoma FD
summary_text: Comedic look at firefighters battling their own boredom.

name: Undine
summary_text: Undine works as a historian lecturing on Berlin's urban development. But when the man she loves leaves her, the ancient myth catches up with her. Undine has to kill the man who betrays her and return to the water.

name: Paranormal Activity
summary_text: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

name: The Ladykillers
summary_text: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.

name: The Rules of Attraction
summary_text: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

name: Coach Carter
summary_text: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

name: Fantastic Four
summary_text: One of Marvel's most iconic families makes it to the big screen: the Fantastic Four.

name: Damages
summary_text: A law school graduate becomes the protégée of a successful high-stakes litigator.

name: Supergirl
summary_text: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

name: The Good Dinosaur
summary_text: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

name: The Book of Life
summary_text: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

name: New Order
summary_text: A lavish high-society wedding unexpectedly turns into a class struggle that leads to a violent coup.

name: Love Machine
summary_text: Director Pavel Ruminov wanted to break up with his girlfriend. But she had a different opinion on the matter and refused to leave the flat, insisting their story was not over yet.

name: Señora Acero
summary_text: Señora Acero 3: La Coyote- Bastard daughter of Vicente Acero, Vicenta Rigores Acero (La Coyote) must come face to face with her destiny to become the New Señora Acero, as she is the inheritor of the Acero family dynasty.

name: Sesame Street
summary_text: Big Bird and his Sesame Street friends are mysteriously expelled from their neighborhood, finding themselves in Manhattan. They team up with a plucky history show host Sally Hawthorne (Anne...                See full summary »

name: Adoration
summary_text: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

name: Warm Bodies
summary_text: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

name: Always Be My Maybe
summary_text: Everyone assumed Sasha and Marcus would wind up together except for Sasha and Marcus. Reconnecting after 15 years, the two start to wonder - maybe?

name: Gaslight
summary_text: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

name: Holby City
summary_text: The everyday lives, professional and personal, of the doctors, nurses and patients who find themselves, for various reasons, in the wards of the frenetic cardiac unit of Holby City General Hospital.

name: Brooklyn
summary_text: An Irish immigrant lands in 1950s Brooklyn, where she quickly falls into a romance with a local. When her past catches up with her, however, she must choose between two countries and the lives that exist within.

name: Northwest Passage
summary_text: Langdon Towne and Hunk Marriner join Major Rogers' Rangers as they wipe out an Indian village. They set out for Fort Wentworth, but when they arrive they find no soldiers and none of the supplies they expected.

name: Inhumans
summary_text: An isolated community of superhumans fight to protect themselves.

name: A Fish Called Wanda
summary_text: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

name: Still Game
summary_text: Cult Scottish comedy about the lives of two OAP's Jack and Victor and their views on how it used to be in the old days and how bad it is now in the fictional area of Craiglang, Glasgow.

name: Finding You
summary_text: Violinist Finley Sinclair travels to an Irish coastal village to begin her semester studying abroad. At the B&B run by her host family she encounters the gregarious and persistent heartthrob movie star Beckett Rush.

name: Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles
summary_text: Set after the events in Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991), Sarah Connor and her son, John, try to stay under-the-radar from the government, as they plot to destroy the computer network, Skynet, in hopes of preventing Armageddon.

name: Definitely, Maybe
summary_text: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

name: The Treacherous
summary_text: The story of Joseon's tyrant king Yeonsan who exploits the populace for his own carnal pleasures, his seemingly loyal retainer who controls him and all court dealings, and a woman who seeks vengeance.

name: The Blackout
summary_text: Life on Earth is rapidly destroyed except for a small area in Eastern Europe.

name: Copenhagen
summary_text: When the girl of your dreams is half your age, it's time to grow up.

name: Gigli
summary_text: Larry Gigli is assigned by a crime boss to kidnap the brother of a prominent district attorney. A beautiful woman known only as Ricki is sent to stay with him to make sure he doesn't mess up the job.

name: A Perfect Ending
summary_text: Rebecca has a very unusual secret, one that not even her best friends know about. The last person on earth she expects to reveal it to is a high priced escort named Paris.

name: The Sisters Brothers
summary_text: Eli and Charlie Sisters, an infamous duo of gunslinging assassins, chase a gold prospector and his unexpected ally in 1850s Oregon.

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
summary_text: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

name: Splice
summary_text: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

name: Paradise PD
summary_text: Animated series about bad cops. Not bad as in corrupt, bad as in under-performing. They aren't first responders, they are the worst responders.

name: Remember Me
summary_text: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

name: On the Rocks
summary_text: A young mother reconnects with her larger-than-life playboy father on an adventure through New York.

name: The Capture
summary_text: When a British soldier is charged with a crime, the tenacious young detective handling his case begins to uncover a multi-layered conspiracy.

name: Bo Burnham: what.
summary_text: A musical stand-up comedy show by Bo Burnham, the famous internet musician.

name: Nothing But Trouble
summary_text: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

name: Penguin Bloom
summary_text: A family takes in an injured Magpie that makes a profound difference in their lives.

name: Starsky and Hutch
summary_text: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of police snitch, Huggy Bear (Antonio Fargas).

name: Cocomelon
summary_text: In the town of Cocomelon, baby JJ and his siblings go on fun every-day adventures with nursery, play, exploration, and learning - situations that any preschooler could relate to. Fun, relatable stories set to toe-tapping songs.

name: The Boy
summary_text: An American nanny is shocked that her new English family's boy is actually a life-sized doll. After she violates a list of strict rules, disturbing events make her believe that the doll is really alive.

name: Glory
summary_text: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

name: Disturbia
summary_text: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

name: Saw V
summary_text: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

name: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
summary_text: A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, and Hellboy his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.

name: Happily
summary_text: A dark romantic comedy. Tom and Janet have been happily married for years. But a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, a lot of questions, and a tense couples' trip with friends who may not actually be friends at all.

name: Zoom
summary_text: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

name: Ninja Assassin
summary_text: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

name: Little Shop of Horrors
summary_text: An exotic plant in a downtown flower shop convinces the storekeeper's meek apprentice to resort to gruesome measures to keep it alive and make it grow.

name: Turning Red
summary_text: A 13-year-old girl turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

name: Rawhide
summary_text: Gil Favor is trail boss of a continuous cattle drive. He is assisted by Rowdy Yates. The crew runs into characters and adventures along the way.

name: Last of the Summer Wine
summary_text: Three old men from Yorkshire who have never grown up face the trials of their fellow town citizens and everyday life and stay young by reminiscing about the days of their youth and attempting feats not common to the elderly.

name: Sleepaway Camp
summary_text: Angela Baker, a shy, traumatized young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

name: The Rhythm Section
summary_text: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

name: Say Anything
summary_text: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

name: Limetown
summary_text: Follows Lia Haddock, a journalist for American Public Radio (APR), as she unravels the mystery behind the disappearance of over 300 people at a neuroscience research facility in Tennessee.

name: Da 5 Bloods
summary_text: Four African-American vets battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen squad leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

name: In the Tall Grass
summary_text: After hearing a young boy's cry for help, a sister and brother venture into a vast field of tall grass in Kansas but soon discover there may be no way out...and that something evil lurks within.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
summary_text: Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

name: A Room with a View
summary_text: Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.

name: The Prince of Egypt
summary_text: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

name: The Finest Hours
summary_text: The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a blizzard in 1952.

name: Jawbreaker
summary_text: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

name: Kidding
summary_text: Jeff, a famous children's television icon, struggles to retain his sanity as his family falls apart.

name: Dogville
summary_text: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

name: The Scary House
summary_text: Hendrik is sixteen, a big city kid, and vexed to learn that his mother is moving with him and his little brother Eddi to a village in the south of Austria. To make matters worse, the locals...                See full summary »

name: Osmosis Jones
summary_text: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

name: Legendary
summary_text: Divas will battle on voguing teams called "houses," with the chance to win a cash prize in ballsy fashion and dance challenges to ultimately achieve "Legendary" status.

name: Centaurworld
summary_text: A hardened war horse transported away from battle finds herself in a land that's inhabited by silly, singing centaurs of all shapes and sizes.

name: Spectral
summary_text: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

name: Spawn
summary_text: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
summary_text: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

name: Gavin & Stacey
summary_text: Gavin and Stacey have been continuing their romance on-line and by telephone for the last six months. Now they want to be together but will their friends and family let them?

name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
summary_text: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

name: My Left Foot
summary_text: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

name: The Exorcist
summary_text: Follows three priests dealing with cases of a demonic presence targeting a family and a foster home.

name: Clerks
summary_text: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

name: No Escape
summary_text: A social media personality travels with his friends to Moscow to capture new content for his successful VLOG. Always pushing the limits and catering to a growing audience, they enter a cold world of mystery, excess, and danger.

name: Freaky Friday
summary_text: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

name: The Name of the Rose
summary_text: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

name: The Right Stuff
summary_text: U.S. fighter pilots are recruited to test experimental aircraft and rockets to become first Mercury astronauts. TV adaptation of Tom Wolfe's book, 'The Right Stuff'.

name: Cheeky
summary_text: While scouting out apartments in London for her Venetian boyfriend, Carla rents an apartment that overlooks the Thames. There she meet the lesbian hyper-horny real estate agent Moira.

name: Haywire
summary_text: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.

name: Anything for Jackson
summary_text: A bereaved Satanist couple kidnap a pregnant woman so they can use an ancient spellbook to put their dead grandson's spirit into her unborn child but end up summoning more than they bargained for.

name: Bloodsport
summary_text: "Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

name: Exodus: Gods and Kings
summary_text: The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

name: The Dukes of Hazzard
summary_text: Cousins Bo, Luke, and Daisy Duke, and their uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.

name: Moon Knight
summary_text: Marc Spector is a former CIA agent whose life is saved by the Moon God, Khonshu.

name: Raven's Home
summary_text: Though Raven Baxter is psychic, she never guessed that she would be a single mother living in an apartment with her twins, Nia and Booker Baxter, and her best friend Chelsea and her son Levi.

name: Two Rode Together
summary_text: A corrupt marshal is pressured by his army friend into negotiating the release of white captives of the Comanches, but finds that their reintegration into society has its consequences.

name: A River Runs Through It
summary_text: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

name: Pixels
summary_text: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

name: Newsies
summary_text: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

name: A Perfect Getaway
summary_text: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

name: The Rundown
summary_text: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

name: Backdraft
summary_text: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

name: Sesame Street
summary_text: On a special inner city street, the inhabitants, human and muppet, teach preschool subjects with comedy, cartoons, games, and songs.

name: Cuckoo
summary_text: Cuckoo is every parent's worst nightmare - a slacker full of outlandish, New Age ideas.

name: Born on the Fourth of July
summary_text: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

name: Cliffhanger
summary_text: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

name: Chad
summary_text: A 14-year-old Persian boy desperately tries to fit in, cope with his mother's dating life, and figure out his cultural identity.

name: The Fall
summary_text: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

name: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
summary_text: The proudly privileged top two students of an elite school each makes it their mission to be the first to extract a confession of love from the other.

name: The Vow
summary_text: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

name: Highway to Heaven
summary_text: A probationary angel, sent back to Earth, teams with an ex-cop to help people.

name: The Beautiful Troublemaker
summary_text: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
summary_text: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

name: The Longest Ride
summary_text: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

name: The Hero
summary_text: An ailing movie star comes to terms with his past and mortality.

name: A Hidden Life
summary_text: The Austrian Franz Jägerstätter, a conscientious objector, refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

name: Haven
summary_text: Many in the coastal town of Haven, Maine have a dormant curse or "trouble" that could trigger at any time for any reason. FBI agent Audrey Parker, the sheriff and the town's black sheep must deal with the troubles' deadly effects.

name: Beethoven
summary_text: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

name: The Third Day
summary_text: A man and a woman make separate journeys to a mysterious island off the British coast.

name: The Angry Birds Movie 2
summary_text: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

name: Now and Then
summary_text: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

name: The Brown Bunny
summary_text: Professional motorcycle racer Bud Clay heads from New Hampshire to California to race again. Along the way he meets various needy women who provide him with the cure to his own loneliness, but only a certain woman from his past will truly satisfy him.

name: My Brilliant Friend
summary_text: A woman recounts the lifelong friendship and conflicts with a girl she met at primary school in Naples during the early 1950s.

name: The Dirty Dozen
summary_text: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

name: Prince of Darkness
summary_text: A group of graduate students and scientists uncover an ancient canister in an abandoned church, but when they open the container, they inadvertently unleash a strange liquid and an evil force on all humanity.

name: Dune
summary_text: A three-part miniseries on politics, betrayal, lust, greed and the coming of a Messiah. Based on Frank Herbert's classic science fiction novel.

name: For a Few Dollars More
summary_text: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

name: Billy Elliot
summary_text: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.
